location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter from Francis Warden, Chief Secretary to the Government of Bombay, to William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire, requesting to forward with urgency all letters received on board the Mercuryfrom Brigadier General Malcolm to Sir Harford Jones and Captain Pasley .
